import re

def owl_pic(text):
    str = re.sub('[^ 8,W,T,Y,U,I,O,A,H,X,V,M]', '', text.upper())
    return str+"''0v0''"+str[::-1]

import re
def owl_pic(text):
    new_string = re.sub(r'(?i)[^8wtyuioahxvm]', "", text).upper()
    return f"{new_string}''0v0''{new_string[::-1]}"

import re

PLUMAGE = re.compile(r'[8WTYUIOAHXVM]')

def owl_pic(text):
    left = ''.join(PLUMAGE.findall(text.upper()))
    return f"{left}''0v0''{left[::-1]}"
